descriptionHtml:
This mod add a ring on the desk of the main room of the Thieves Guild. This ring allows for the following skills to be 100% easier when worn. 

Sneak

Lockpick

Pickpocket

As an added bonus the bearer of this particular ring, when worn, grants an extra 200lb carryweight for all the little (or big) trinkets you might happen upon.

There will be additions for Dark Brotherhood, College of Winterhold, and The Companions respectively. 
Also if i can figure out how to use this new 3D modeler software i have. i will be working on some new items and armor to add to this game.
author: formofsolitude
